message.body: Want to grab dinner tomorrow night?
I get out of work around 6:15. I'm at #### and #######. I'm fine with anywhere in the city but am always game for Penang
Never been there. I'm down. Where is it?
It's at 10th and arch. It's Malaysian and the food is fantastic but you might want to check out the menu before you agree.
Looks fine to me, plenty of options. 6:45?
I'm here, seat in the window
Thanks for the dinner recommendation, it was great! Really glad I finally got to see you. By the way my ulock opened as soon as I got home :-P
Yay not busted ulock! We must do this more. Btw going out for first Friday if you want to come down to old city.
Possibly! I don't have plans so it just depends how tired I am :-)
